script.name: Menu.PC.TemplateManager.SM
script.description: Menu: Ship Template Manager - Set Menu

line.comment: * display subtitle text: text=$CallbackReturn duration=5000 ms
* $Text1 = sprintf: fmt='%s', $TemplateCount, null, null, null, null
* display subtitle text: text=$Text1 duration=1234 ms
* $Templates = sort two dimentional array by element: array=$Templates, element=1, reverse=[TRUE]
* Each array item of the above variables is another array of the following:
* 15 OOS Laser Switch info (Size 2 array, or null)
* Temporarily disabled descriptions, because I can't see a use. Still there
* set menu option: $Menu, maximum menu height=15 lines
* ---- User chose a template to view ------
*add custom menu info line to array $Menu: text=$Text1
* $Text2 = sprintf: pageid=8396 textid=108, $ItemCurrent, null, null, null, null
* $Text2 = sprintf: pageid=8396 textid=108, $ItemCurrent, null, null, null, null
* $Text2 = sprintf: pageid=8396 textid=108, $ItemCurrent, null, null, null, null
* $Text2 = sprintf: pageid=8396 textid=108, $ItemCurrent, null, null, null, null
* $Text2 = sprintf: pageid=8396 textid=108, $ItemCurrent, null, null, null, null

line.text: 'TemplateManager error, quantity and ware arrays dont match'

sval.val: Menu: Ship Template Manager - Set Menu
Select ship as template to add...
Enter the name of this template...
TemplateManager error, quantity and ware arrays dont match
display subtitle text: text=$CallbackReturn duration=5000 ms
$Text1 = sprintf: fmt='%s', $TemplateCount, null, null, null, null
display subtitle text: text=$Text1 duration=1234 ms
$Templates = sort two dimentional array by element: array=$Templates, element=1, reverse=[TRUE]
Each array item of the above variables is another array of the following:
15 OOS Laser Switch info (Size 2 array, or null)
Temporarily disabled descriptions, because I can't see a use. Still there
set menu option: $Menu, maximum menu height=15 lines
---- User chose a template to view ------
add custom menu info line to array $Menu: text=$Text1
$Text2 = sprintf: pageid=8396 textid=108, $ItemCurrent, null, null, null, null
$Text2 = sprintf: pageid=8396 textid=108, $ItemCurrent, null, null, null, null
$Text2 = sprintf: pageid=8396 textid=108, $ItemCurrent, null, null, null, null
$Text2 = sprintf: pageid=8396 textid=108, $ItemCurrent, null, null, null, null
$Text2 = sprintf: pageid=8396 textid=108, $ItemCurrent, null, null, null, null
